plot: Unsettled by something he heard on the ghost ship, Kid asks his father an unimaginable question. Dr. Stein has his own questions regarding Medusa's qualifications as a nurse.
title: Sôru îtâ" Gekitou! Yuurei sen. Boku no atama no naka no jigoku?
